post_title: PRICE DROP; T206 J. McGraw portrait Psa 4
post_content:
**Card is sold**

I've recently upgraded making this duplicate available. Very sharp Psa 4 HOF portrait. Price shown includes delivery. 

John McGraw no hat - [STRIKE]$475[/STRIKE] $415
(faint front surface wrinkle left side / does not show on the reverse)

If you have interest please just drop me an email or PM

Payment via PayPal is preferred, but willing to listen to other options as well.

A commitment to purchase outweighs any ongoing negotiation.

Thanks all,

[url]andreatny@q.com[/url]


[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/threetwocount/threetwocount/t206mcgrawfront4sale.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/threetwocount/threetwocount/t206mcgrawback4sale.jpg[/IMG]
A Labor Day bumparoo for Hughie and Johnny M.....
Wow, great looking cards at a nice price. GLWS.

Bob & Michael, thank you for the kudos.

Bump!
Friday bump priced well below recent comps.

2 week bumparoo with another price adjustment.
